parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is secured by the certificate. The domain name uses HTTPS acceleration.

parameters.name: ServerCertificate
parameters.description: The content of the certificate. The certificate must match the certificate signing request (CSR) created by calling the [CreateDcdnCertificateSigningRequest](~~144478~~) operation. Make sure that the certificate is in PEM format and its content is Base64-encoded and then encoded by encodeURIComponent.
